alert.note: Alert for Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 3:11PM EDT until August 21 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Pender County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 311 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burgaw, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Burgaw, White Stocking, Rocky Point, Maple Hill, Long Creek, Murray Town, Malpass Corner, Ashton, St. Helena, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
